body_html: Yes thank you, was very hard to figure this out without lots of googling. Tensor flow doesn't mention this anywhere in setup guide and brew install on Mac defaults to python 3.7, seems weird it wouldn't support. I'm new to python world, but would only expect major release version 4.x to break anything. Also finding how u can get 3.6 with brew is also more googling. Finally, what's up with Pip?! I'd expect an error explaining this not something cryptic. Anyway that's my little rant on python dependency management as a first impression. Am up and running now .
